rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
血管壁中的分子传感器可预防高血压隆德大学的一个研究小组研究了位于血管壁上的分子传感器如何控制血管补偿高血压的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Molecular-sensor-in-the-blood-vessel-wall-protects-against-high-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Molecular-sensor-in-the-blood-vessel-wall-protects-against-high-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d450e0a-4e7e-4b2d-9649-c33221a6a194 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 16:36:08 -0400 Molecular sensor in the blood vessel wall protects against high blood pressure
常见除草剂暴露与青少年大脑功能恶化有关除草剂是全世界使用最广泛的一类农药，广泛用于农业、家庭和工业。加州大学圣地亚哥分校赫伯特沃特海姆公共卫生与人类长寿科学学院的研究人员领导的一项研究表明，接触两种最流行的除草剂与青少年的大脑功能较差有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Common-herbicide-exposure-linked-to-worse-brain-function-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Common-herbicide-exposure-linked-to-worse-brain-function-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b81c4ebf-2562-4468-bd32-1c123cc551f2 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 15:45:41 -0400 Common herbicide exposure linked to worse brain function in adolescents
研究揭示了创伤记忆是如何产生的长期以来，科学家们一直在推测新记忆形成时大脑中发生的物理变化。现在，国家生理科学研究所 (NIPS) 的研究揭示了这个有趣的神经学之谜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Study-sheds-light-on-how-traumatic-memories-are-created.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Study-sheds-light-on-how-traumatic-memories-are-created.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69273eb4-a618-4813-b453-3ad389350fe1 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 15:35:17 -0400 Study sheds light on how traumatic memories are created
西奈山研究人员获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助，用于比较镰状细胞病的新治疗方案西奈山卫生系统已从国家心肺和血液研究所获得 12,180,625 美元的赠款，用于比较镰状细胞病的新治疗方案，并确定哪种方案最适合特定患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Mount-Sinai-researchers-receive-NIH-grant-to-compare-new-treatment-options-for-sickle-cell-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Mount-Sinai-researchers-receive-NIH-grant-to-compare-new-treatment-options-for-sickle-cell-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc80a429-8de8-40b4-96eb-28edbed82a56 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 15:32:06 -0400 Mount Sinai researchers receive NIH grant to compare new treatment options for sickle cell disease
新的阿尔茨海默病研究结合了针对淀粉样蛋白和 tau 蛋白的药物一项新的研究将把一种可以减缓某些患者疾病进展的阿尔茨海默氏症药物与另外两种药物结合起来，看看它们的作用是否可以放大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/New-Alzheimers-study-to-combine-drugs-targeting-amyloid-and-tau- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/New-Alzheimers-study-to-combine-drugs-targeting-amyloid-and-tau- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b31b338-23cb-4afb-9c34-5d6032ec9e57 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 15:27:39 -0400 New Alzheimer's study to combine drugs targeting amyloid and tau proteins
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：在没有发言者的国会中，医疗资金存在问题当众议院共和党人再次努力决定谁将领导他们时，一项短期支出法案的时间正在流逝，该法案使联邦政府只能运行到 11 月中旬。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Health-funding-in-question-in-a-speaker-less-Congress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Health-funding-in-question-in-a-speaker-less-Congress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f77adcc-c218-4019-b9ce-28e2cb22d271 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 15:04:15 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Health funding in question in a speaker-less Congress
研究让患者放心广泛使用的高血压药物氨氯地平的安全性牛津大学出版社出版的《功能》杂志上的一篇新论文发现，尽管研究人员和临床医生最近担心服用氨氯地平可能存在风险，但广泛用于治疗高血压的药物氨氯地平对患者并不危险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Study-reassures-病人-on-safety-of-widely-prescribed-hypertension-drug-amlodipine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Study-reassures-病人-on-safety-of-widely-prescribed-hypertension-drug-amlodipine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=793b6142-70ba-4068-821f-4a64b7b09299 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 15:01:22 -0400 Study reassures patients on safety of widely prescribed hypertension drug amlodipine
研究提出了对抗侵袭性脑肿瘤的潜在策略一项新研究揭示了癌细胞如何应对复制应激与牛磺酸上调基因 1 (TUG1) 的作用之间的重要联系。通过用药物靶向 TUG1，研究人员能够控制小鼠脑肿瘤的生长，这提出了一种对抗侵袭性脑肿瘤（如胶质母细胞瘤）的潜在策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Study-suggests-a-pottial-strategy-to-combat-aggressive-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Study-suggests-a-pottial-strategy-to-combat-aggressive-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3510f7df-e449-47a3-90d8-71d7001d61bb Thu, 12 Oct 2023 14:50:32 -0400 Study suggests a potential strategy to combat aggressive brain tumors
研究人员呼吁紧急改善炎症性关节炎患者的疼痛管理基尔大学医学院的研究人员发现，镇痛药（俗称“止痛药”）在英格兰各地广泛用于治疗炎症性关节炎患者，尽管很少有研究证据表明它们可以改善这些患者的疼痛，而且研究表明它们可能会导致严重的副作用-效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Researchers-call-for-urgent-improvement-in-pain-management-for-炎症-关节炎-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Researchers-call-for-urgent-improvement-in-pain-management-for-炎症-关节炎-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e938892f-42b7-4616-acdc-000790affb3f Thu, 12 Oct 2023 14:27:10 -0400 Researchers call for urgent improvement in pain management for inflammatory arthritis patients
TTUHSC 获得近 230 万美元的 CPRIT 赠款以支持癌症研究德克萨斯州癌症预防和研究所 (CPRIT) 最近向德克萨斯理工大学健康科学中心 (TTUHSC) 的四名研究人员提供了资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/TTUHSC-receives-nearly-2423-million-in-CPRIT-grants-to-support-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/TTUHSC-receives-nearly-2423-million-in-CPRIT-grants-to-support-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ff88994-f753-4a3b-a0b7-200b6f78f688 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 13:14:38 -0400 TTUHSC receives nearly $2.3 million in CPRIT grants to support cancer research
